mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account(userid, password, nickname, mail, role) VALUES (#{userId}, #{password}, #{nickName}, #{mail}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT IF(COUNT(userid) = 1, 1, 0) FROM account WHERE userid = #{userId}
SELECT IF(COUNT(mail) = 1, 1, 0) FROM account WHERE mail = #{mail}
SELECT IF(COUNT(nickname) = 1, 1, 0) FROM account WHERE nickname = #{nickName}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM account WHERE userid= #{userId} AND password= #{password}
